actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide that members of the Armed Forces be assigned to duty stations near their homes after serving in combat zones.

summary.text: Provides that members of the armed forces be assigned to duty stations near their homes after serving in combat zones. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 1041)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide that members of the Armed Forces be assigned to duty stations near their homes after serving in combat zones.
